DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status of patient's consent for banking of tissue.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient's permission for use of their tissue (a group or layer of cells that are alike and that work together to perform a specific function) or serum (the clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Permission to do something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the status of patient consent for banking tissue and serum.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to allow tissue from tumor to be collected for tumor banking?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to provide leftover bone marrow and/or blood to be kept (banked) for future use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: My specimens may be kept for use in research about other health problems (for example: causes of diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient given permission for optional sample banking for future cancer research studies?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to tumor tissue banking

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to leftover tumor sample(s) that may be kept for research to learn about, prevent or treat other health problems (i.e: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to leftover tumor sample(s) that may be kept for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to leftover bone marrow to be kept (banked) for future use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to provide extra bone marrow to be kept (banked) for future use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Was consent given for patient's tissue, blood, and/or pheresate samples to be kept (banked) for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer or other health problems (for example: diabetes, Alzheimer's disease, or heart disease)?
